Access_source_code.tooltiptext: Source code must be available while using the software privately without distributing it

Use_software.tooltiptext: You may use the software without distributing it

Copy_software.tooltiptext: You may copy the software without distributing it

Modify_software.tooltiptext: You may modify the software without distributing it

Mention_modification_date_in_a_notice.tooltiptext: Indicate the date of changes made to the code

Mention_developer_name.tooltiptext: Indicate the name of the developer who changes the code

Mention_made_modification_in_a_notice.tooltiptext: Indicate changes made to the code

Notify_software_community_with_the_made_.tooltiptext: Inform the software community with the made changes

Rename_modified_software.tooltiptext: Rename modified software with different names to distinguish it from the original software

Mark_modified_source_versions.tooltiptext: Modified source versions must be marked to distinguish them from the original software

Share_through_technological_medium.tooltiptext: The modification must be accessible in the public domain i.e.: archive site, webblogs or mailing groups etc...

Include_modification_in_the_standard_ver.tooltiptext: The copyright holder may include the modification in the standard version

Make_arrangement_with_copyright_holder.tooltiptext: The user make distribution arrangements with copyright holder

Send_unpublished_modifications_to_initia.tooltiptext: The initial developer may request unpublished modifications

Include_copy_of_the_license.tooltiptext: Include a copy of the license with the code

Include_copyright_notice.tooltiptext: Include copyright notice with the code

Include_notice.tooltiptext: The license specifies a specific notices that the user have to add in the software

Include_initial_developer_name.tooltiptext: Include the name of the initial developer of the original code

Include_third_party_intellectual_propert.tooltiptext: The user may track third party intellectual property claims

Mention_disclaimer_of_warranty_and_limit.tooltiptext: Software is provided without warranty and the software author cannot be held liable for damages

Mention_disclaimer_of_high_risk_activiti.tooltiptext: Licensor and contributors disclaim any warranty for high risk activity

Object_code.tooltiptext: The object code is available when distributing the software

Source_code.tooltiptext: The source code is available when distributing the software

Physical_meduim.tooltiptext: The user may distribute the software on a physical medium

Directions.tooltiptext: The user may provide clear directions next to the object code to say where to find the source code

Link.tooltiptext: The user may find the source code through a link on a website or an archive site

Available_at_least_six_months.tooltiptext: Modifications must remain available at least six months after the date it initially became available

Available_as_much_as_the_code_is_deploye.tooltiptext: Modifications must remain available as long as you externally deploy the modified code

Available_at_least_twelve_months.tooltiptext: Modifications must remain available at least twelve months after the date it initially became available or from the date of initial external deployment

Available_at_least_three_years.tooltiptext: Modifications must remain available at least three years in order to get the digital copy of the covered code

Peer_to_peer.tooltiptext: The user may distribute the source code or object code using peer-to-peer transmission

Library.tooltiptext: This license is related to a library

Combined_work_with_a_library.tooltiptext: The user may make combine a work with a library

Combined_work_with_a_framework.tooltiptext: The user may combine a work with a framework

Whole_software.tooltiptext: This license is related to the whole software

Portion_of_software.tooltiptext: This license is related to a portion of the software

File_containing_code_from_the_software.tooltiptext: This license is related to a file containing code from the software

Provide_the_source_code_of_software_when.tooltiptext: Users who interact with the software via network are given the right to receive a copy of the corresponding source code (network use is distribution)

Provide_the_base_elements_required_to_bu.tooltiptext: Provide the base code of the framework which is required to build the source code

Accompany_the_work_with_written_offer.tooltiptext: The user may accompany the work with written offer to get the source code of the library

Accompany_the_work_with_source_code_of_l.tooltiptext: The user may accompany the work with the source code of the library

Offer_access_to_a_copy.tooltiptext: The user may offer access to copy the source code

Link_the_library_with_suitable_shared_me.tooltiptext: The user may use a suitable shared mechanism to link with the library

Provide_installation_information.tooltiptext: The user must include the installation information necessary to modify and reinstall the software

The_recipient_can_identify_the_contribut.tooltiptext: Recipients are able to identify the originator of the contribution since each contributor identify itself as the originator of its contribution

Disclaiming_warranty_or_limiting_liabili.tooltiptext: The user may mention the disclaimer of warranty or the limItation of liability with a different manner

Requiring_preservation_of_legal_notices_.tooltiptext: The user may conserve legal notices or author attributions in the material or in the appropriate legal notices

Prohibiting_misrepresentation_of_the_add.tooltiptext: The user may prohibit misrepresentation of the material

Limiting_the_use_for_publicity_purposes_.tooltiptext: The user may limit the use for publicity purposes of names of licensors or authors of the material

Declining_to_grant_rights_of_trademarks.tooltiptext: The user may decline to grant rights under trademark law

Requiring_indemnification_of_licensors_a.tooltiptext: The user may require indemnification of licensors and authors of the material by anyone who conveys the material

Applicable_to_a_part_of_the_program.tooltiptext: The additional permissive terms may be applicable to a part of the program

Applicable_to_the_whole_program.tooltiptext: The additional permissive terms may be applicable to the whole program

Add_non_predefined_terms.tooltiptext: The user may add further restrictions which are called additional non permissive terms

Allow_to_modify_terms.tooltiptext: The user can provide additional or different license terms and conditions for use, reproduction, or distribution of covered code

Have_to_release_unmodified_software_unde.tooltiptext: The unmodied software must be released under the same license

Can_release_unmodified_software_under_an.tooltiptext: The unmodied software can be released under another compatible license

Have_to_release_modified_software_under_.tooltiptext: The modied software must be released under the same license

Can_release_modified_software_under_anot.tooltiptext: The modied software can be released under another compatible license

Can_link_or_combine_the_software_with_so.tooltiptext: The software can be linked or combined with a work released under another license

Can_release_combined_software_under_anot.tooltiptext: The resulted software can be released under another license

Can_release_object_code_under_another_li.tooltiptext: The object code of the software can be released under another license

Can_release_modified_software_under_mult.tooltiptext: The software can be released under multiple licenses

Have_to_release_file_containing_code_fro.tooltiptext: The file containing code from the software must be released under the same license

Grant_license_to_software.tooltiptext: The user may grant a license to the software

Extend_license_to_software.tooltiptext: The user may extend a license to the software

License_terms_infringement.tooltiptext: License is infringed in case of patent infringement or license violation

Against_contributor.tooltiptext: Existence of patent litigation terminate patent licenses on the date the litigation is filed against contributor, against any entity or against licensor

Against_any_entity.tooltiptext: Existence of patent litigation terminate patent licenses on the date the litigation is filed against contributor, against any entity or against licensor

Against_licensor.tooltiptext: Existence of patent litigation terminate patent licenses on the date the litigation is filed against contributor, against any entity or against licensor

Inconsistency_with_regulations.tooltiptext: This feature is applied in case of inability to comply to the license terms

Require_to_include_limitations_and_affec.tooltiptext: This feature describes the limItations done by the user and the code they affect

Make_a_payment_arrangement.tooltiptext: The user may make a payment arrangement with the Licensor or contributor

Terminate_license.tooltiptext: If the license can’t comply with terms of the license or cant cure the breach within a period of time then s/he will be deprived from using the OSS

Terminate_patent.tooltiptext: If license can’t respect patent terms or starts a patent litigation against a licensor or contributor then all OSS patent shall terminate

Licensee_shall_claim_compensation_for_an.tooltiptext: Each licensee shall claim compensation for any loss proved against the licensor

Legal_entity_indemnify_their_contributor.tooltiptext: Any legal entity has the right to indemnify the contributors

Prevailing_party_shall_recover_attorneys.tooltiptext: The main party shall recover attorneys fees and costs

Prohibit_using_trademarks.tooltiptext: This license explicitly states that it does not grant you trademark rights, even though licenses without such a statement probably do not grant you any implicit trademark rights

Forbid_tivoization.tooltiptext: The license allows to reinforce the protection of the freedom of the Libre

Forbid_digital_management_rights.tooltiptext: The license allows to reinforce the protection of the freedom of the Libre

Do_not_distribute_software_if_patent_and.tooltiptext: If there are obligations from a patent license in disagree with the license then there are no distribution

May_exclude_countries_if_distribution_or.tooltiptext: If there are countries which restrict the use and the distribution then the user may exclude them

Grant_patent_license_to_institution_and_.tooltiptext: Patent license in institution and universities may be granted

May_charge_a_fee_for_warranty_protection.tooltiptext: The user may offer a warranty protection with a charge

May_charge_an_unlimited_amount_for_copy_.tooltiptext: The user may charge for a copy transfer with an unlimited fee

May_charge_fees_for_copy_transfer_not_ex.tooltiptext: The user may offer source code for a charge not exceeding the physical source distribution

May_charge_the_value_added_services.tooltiptext: The user may charge fees for added services
